meanings.definition: Meowed: made the characteristic sound of a cat
meanings.sent1: The cat meowed loudly outside my window.
meanings.sent2: Yesterday, my cat meowed for food all day.
meanings.sent3: When the cat meowed at the door, I knew it wanted to come inside.
meanings.sent4: The lonely cat meowed into the night, hoping for a friend.
meanings.sent5: The kitten meowed pitifully, tugging at my heartstrings.

meanings.sent1: Last night, my cat meowed at the moon.
meanings.sent2: She meowed softly as I stroked her fur.
meanings.sent3: The cat meowed and meowed until I gave it a treat.
meanings.sent4: The old cat meowed in a way that seemed almost human.
meanings.sent5: The cat meowed in delight as it played with a ball of yarn.
